cause.description:
Volunteers are needed to help campaign against heart disease.
Doctors needed to give cholesterol screenings
We want to help people who are poorly educated in matters of pathologies of the heart and bring awareness and a chance for people to get their cholesterol levels tested.
1. We believe heart disease can be prevented
2. We believe anyone can join in on the fight for a healthy heart
3. We believe that the reason that heart disease is the number 1 cause of death in America is because of the lack of education people recieve on this subject
cause.mission: put an end to the number 1 cause of health related death through the power of education
cause.name: Healthy Heart Start
